help-file.title: CENTAUR
help-file.content:
Centaurs are a half horse, half human race, with the upper half looking like a human, and the lower half looking like a large draft horse. Centaurs are quiet, forest dwelling creatures from a far off forest covered land. Centaurs are a good race, and thus will be on the good side of the race wars on Duris. Being a seclusive race, centaurs are shy and slow to trust. Because of this, only their own race and those of the elven and half-elven race may enter their hometown. All other races are considered invaders, and will be attacked on sight!
Centaur class list: Warrior, Ranger, Druid, Shaman.
Stats: Centaur are a very powerful race and have both great strength and hearty constitution. Being 1/2 horse, they can out-distance any other race in the world, being able to travel miles a day without growing tired. They are not known for their wit or wisdom however and thus seldom dabble in the mystic arts. They do however make decent Druids and Shamans, due to their high constitution. Centaur are so good with the bow that they gain a +2 to hit and a +1 on damage, due to their great strength. Their flighty nature and attunement with their environment allows them to be always AWARE and thus it is difficult to backstab them.
Centaur innate abilities: infravision, doorkick, stampede
Weakness: Centaurs are a flighty race by nature, and thus ALWAYS flee when they hear the roar of a dragon, and in fact, flee quite a lot. Also, given their odd body shape, Centaur cannot bash nor can they BE based by any race, save the Ogre, due to his great size and strength. Centaur can't wear anything on their legs, and can only wear horseshoes on their feet. They can however wear a ring on their tail.
Centaur have been known to sometimes allow their close friends to ride on their backs, but they must be wearing a saddle, and give consent.
